snippet.title: Olive's Art-Venture - Fight your way up the magi-art tower by drawing shapes to cast spells!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://andyl4nd.itch.io/olives-art-venture?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Olive's Art-Venture is  a spell-slinging arena and mobbing game.

Use the paper on the right side of the  screen to draw shapes which then cast spells, damaging enemies and protecting you. 

Every level introduces a new enemy as you attempt to make your way to the top floor and kick whoever's butt built this crazy place!

➡️ More from Andrés Guerrero https://andyl4nd.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More games with pixel art https://itch.io/games/tag-pixel-art?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
